Package com.toropov.oleg.entity.predator

Class FoxCub

java.lang.Object
com.toropov.oleg.entity.Entity
com.toropov.oleg.entity.Creature

com.toropov.oleg.entity.predator.Foxes
com.toropov.oleg.entity.predator.FoxCub
All Implemented Interfaces:
Kids
public class FoxCub extends Foxes implements Kids
Represents a fox cub in the simulation. Fox cubs have parents and eventually transform into adult foxes.

  • Constructor Details

    • FoxCub

      public FoxCub(Coordinates coordinates, int speed, int healthPoints, int generation)
      Constructs a FoxCub with specified coordinates, speed, health points, and generation.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the initial coordinates of the fox cub
      speed - the movement speed of the fox cub
      healthPoints - the initial health points of the fox cub
      generation - the generation of the fox cub

  • Method Details

      Sets a parent entity for the fox cub.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the parent entity
      entity - the parent entity

    • getAllParents

      public List<Entity> getAllParents()
      Gets a list of all parent entities of the fox cub.
      Returns:
      a list of parent entities

    • getParents

      public Entity getParents(WorldMap map, int healthPoints)
      Gets a parent entity based on the fox cub's health points and current entity counts.
      Parameters:
      map - the world map
      healthPoints - the current health points of the fox cub
      Returns:
      the selected parent entity

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(WorldMap map)
      Makes a move for the fox cub. If the fox cub still has parents, it waits for them to leave the current cell. Otherwise, it transforms into an adult.
      Overrides:
      makeMove in class Foxes
      Parameters:
      map - the world map
